name: abeqin
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0

stmt.origin: 3eqtr4i(c0, crab(s0, c1, w0), cin(c2, c1), cin(cab(s0, w0), c1))

body.origin:
|- wceq(c0, crab(s0, c1, w0))
-| wceq(cin(c2, c1), cin(cab(s0, w0), c1))
-| wceq(c0, cin(c2, c1))
-| wceq(crab(s0, c1, w0), cin(cab(s0, w0), c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, crab(s0, c1, w0))
-| wceq(cin(c2, c1), cin(cab(s0, w0), c1))
-| wceq(c0, cin(c2, c1))
-| wceq(crab(s0, c1, w0), cin(cab(s0, w0), c1))

body.origin:
|- wceq(cin(c2, c1), cin(cab(s0, w0), c1))
-| wceq(c2, cab(s0, w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, crab(s0, c1, w0))
-| wceq(c0, cin(c2, c1))
-| wceq(crab(s0, c1, w0), cin(cab(s0, w0), c1))
-| wceq(c2, cab(s0, w0))

body.origin:
|- wceq(crab(s0, c1, w0), cin(cab(s0, w0), c1))
-| diffsc(s0, c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, crab(s0, c1, w0))
-| wceq(c0, cin(c2, c1))
-| wceq(c2, cab(s0, w0))
-| diffsc(s0, c1)

comment: Intersection with class abstraction. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 21-Jul-2021.)
